sentences.sContent: In The Possessed the earth quakes: it is not the catastrophe that befalls the imaginative individual, but a cataclysm in which a large portion of humanity is buried, wiped out forever.
sentences.sContent_eng: In The Possessed the earth quakes: it is not the catastrophe that befalls the imaginative individual, but a cataclysm in which a large portion of humanity is buried, wiped out forever.
sentences.sCn: 在《魔鬼》中发生了地震，这不仅是降临在富于想象力的人头上的大灾难，而是一大半人类被埋葬于其中、永远被消灭的大地震。

synos.tran: 灾难；大洪水，地震；（社会政治的）大变动

remMethod.val: cata (向下) + clysm (洗) → 大洪水

trans.tranCn: 灾难； 大洪水；  大变动
trans.tranOther: a violent or sudden event or change, such as a serious flood or  earthquake
